name: QZone-Stylish
description: 美化您的QQ空间～ Github：https://github.com/imShZh/QZone-Stylus 觉得不错就给个Star哦～
css: @-moz-document domain("qq.com"){li[type='mv'], li[type='class'], li[type='app'], div.head-detail-info, div.mod-side-nav-recently-used, span.qz-app-flag.wing-fly, a.icon-qzphone.qz-app-flag, a.user-medal, span.js-private-comment, #qz-head-level, #qz_notification, #recent_visitors_side, .vip-tag, .vip-info-bar.open-vip, .f-single-biz, .openVipButton, a[class^='qz_vip_icon'], a[title='开通黄钻'], img[alt='黄钻图标'], img[alt='绿钻图标'], img[alt='会员图标'], a[title='开通黄钻查看被挡访客'], a[title='点击开通访客详情特权'], #nopower_see_refuse p:last-of-type, #nopower_see_refuse .actions{display: none !important;}.ui-dl-bd {height: 310px !important;}.qz_pop_icon .txt {text-align: center;margin: 0 30px;}.qz_pop_icon .txt > h3 {font-size: 1.35em;}.qz_pop_icon .txt p:last-child a:last-child {text-decoration: none;color: #edba45;}.qz_pop_icon .txt p:last-child a:last-child:hover {text-decoration: underline;}div.top-fix-wrap > *:not(:first-child), div.top-fix-extend, span.btn-head-like, #QM_100004_Body, #tab_switch, #weatherDiv, #QM_Mood_Poster_Container, .edit_title_link, #accessory_zoom{display: none !important;}#tab_hide_list {display: block !important;}a.logo {position: absolute;width: 27px !important;top: -35px;left: -27px;}div.top-fix-inner {width: 0 !important;height: 0 !important;border: 35px solid transparent;border-top: 35px solid black;border-left: 35px solid black;background-color: transparent !important;-webkit-box-shadow: none !important;-moz-box-shadow: none !important;box-shadow: none !important;}div.top-fix-bar {height: 0 !important;}div.top-fix-wrap {margin: 0 !important;}div.head-info {position: relative !important;top: auto !important;text-align: center;}span.title-text {color: white !important;font-family: serif;font-size: 2.25rem !important;font-weight: 600;}div.head-detail-name > span.user-name {color: white !important;font-size: 1.5rem !important;font-family: serif;}div.layout-head {padding-top: 30px;}div.head-detail {position: relative !important;left: 0 !important;}div.head-detail-name {text-align: center;padding-top: 7px;}div.layout-nav, div.layout-nav-inner {height: 85px;}.layout-shop-item, .shop-item {position: relative !important;}.shop-item {top: 200px !important;left: 0 !important;width: auto !important;}img.user-avatar {border: 2px solid #d0d7de !important;border-radius: 50% !important;}div.head-avatar {position: relative !important;border: none !important;margin: 0 auto;bottom: 155px !important;}ul.head-nav-menu {display: flex;margin: 0 auto;justify-content: space-evenly;}li[class^='menu_item_'] {height: 40px !important;border: 2px solid #d0d7de;border-radius: 0.5rem;box-shadow: black 0 0 15px;background: white;}li[class^='menu_item_'] > a {width: 85px;padding: 0 !important;text-align: center;line-height: 40px !important;font-family: serif;font-size: 1.1rem !important;font-weight: 500;}li[class^='menu_item_'] > a:hover {text-decoration: none;font-size: 1.2rem !important;font-weight: 600;}li[class^='menu_item_']:hover {box-shadow: black 0 0 30px;}li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-last-of-type(1), li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-last-of-type(2), li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-last-of-type(3){display: none;}li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-of-type(1) {order: 1;}li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-of-type(2) {order: 4;}li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-of-type(3) {order: 3;}li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-of-type(4) {order: 5;}li[class^='menu_item_']:nth-of-type(5) {order: 2;}div.mod-side-nav.mod-side-nav-message {border-radius: 0.5rem !important;}ul.sn-list {padding: 0 !important;}#tab_menu_friend {border-radius: 0.5rem !important;}li.f-single, .fn-feed-control-v2, #QM_Container_3, #QM_Container_100003{border-radius: 0.5rem !important;}.fn-feed-control-v2 .control-inner {border: none;}div.update-more.loading-more {border-radius: 0.5rem !important;}.comments-op > a:nth-last-child(1).act-reply {vertical-align: -4px !important;}a.hot-msg {display: none !important;}#_returnTop_layout_inner {border: none;}#_returnTop_layout_inner > a {color: black;font-family: serif;border-radius: 50% !important;box-shadow: currentColor 0 0 15px;}#_returnTop_layout_inner > a:hover {box-shadow: black 0 0 30px;}div.layout-copyright, div.layout-copyright > p > a{color: white;}div.update-more.check-more {border-radius: 0.5rem !important;}br {display: none !important;}a.fn-feed-more-href {width: 100% !important;}li.past-years-date-li {padding-top: 0 !important;margin-bottom: 12px !important;}div.f-info-l {display: none !important;}img[src^='http://qzonestyle.gtimg.cn/qzone/em/'] {width: 24px !important;}div.f-reprint {margin-top: 11px;}div.background-container, div.layout-background, div.layout-nav, div.lay_background{background: none!important;}body.bg-body {background:url('https://img-stroage.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/uPic/background.jpeg')fixed no-repeat center / cover!important;}.user-vip-info {display: none !important;}#headContainer {height: 250px !important;}.report {margin-top: 20px;}#dialog_content_3, #jubao_frame {height: 360px !important;}html {font-size: 100% !important;}span.description-text {display: none;}iframe {border-radius: 0.5rem !important;}#blogPrivilegeAd {display: none;}#id_INNER {display: none !important;}#ifeedsContainer {padding-top: 0;}div.user-pto img {border: 1px solid #d0d7de !important;}#id_PHOTOWALL {margin-bottom: 0 !important;}.mod-tab-other {display: none !important;}div.feed_head.bbor3 {display: none;}div.bor.mod-tab.author_display {display: none;}#cheatHintArea, span.userlevel, span[rel^='user_vip_info_']{display: none !important;}}
